CLIENT_RETENTION.RETENTION_DETAIL: New Client Retention: If a client's first visit is within the below date range, they will be included in the report. Recurring Client Retention: If a client has had a recurring visit within the below date range, they will be included in the report. Retention is calculated based on total visits starting with the selected Begin Date up to the date the report is generated.
